text: I wish there was a way to describe @KnativeProject in one sentence without the need to explain that “serverless” doesn’t mean functions/no-servers every time I talk about it (which is often). I like this analysis by @holly_cummins about naming serverless: https://t.co/0lec7g6GHV

author.name: Thomas Vitale
author.description: Cloud Architect and Software Engineer | Author of "Cloud Native Spring in Action" | I write about Java, Kubernetes, Cloud Native. https://t.co/h25IRNVwnU
